content.html:
Can't wait to get mine.

I'm sure it'll meet all my practical needs, but I would definitely have paid extra for a webcam and mic, so that I can use it for conference calls in-a-pinch.

A microSD slot would have been nice for offloading media from my drone/go pro, but again, not a huge deal; my accessories pack will have a card reader and small USB webcam.

I sure do hope the production keyboard feel is better than the reviewer describes, though!
